description.zh-cn: 1937年8月9日发生在中国上海的一次中日冲突事件，被视为淞沪会战的导火线之一。
description.en: A Sino-Japanese conflict that occurred in Shanghai, China on August 9, 1937, considered one of the catalysts for the Battle of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 日本上海海军特别陆战队中尉，在虹桥机场事件中被中国卫兵击毙。
description.en: A lieutenant in the Japanese Shanghai Special Naval Landing Party, killed by Chinese guards during the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 日本上海海军特别陆战队一等水兵，在虹桥机场事件中被中国卫兵击毙。
description.en: A first-class seaman in the Japanese Shanghai Special Naval Landing Party, killed by Chinese guards during the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 日本在上海的军事单位，参与了虹桥机场事件及淞沪会战。
description.en: A Japanese military unit in Shanghai involved in the Hongqiao Airport Incident and the Battle of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的军用机场，是虹桥机场事件的发生地。
description.en: A military airport in Shanghai, China, and the site of the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中日双方在抗日战争中第一场重要战役，虹桥机场事件是其导火线之一。
description.en: The first major battle of the Second Sino-Japanese War, triggered in part by the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1932年发生于上海的中日军事冲突，其后签订了《淞沪停战协定》。
description.en: A military conflict between China and Japan in Shanghai in 1932, which led to the signing of the Shanghai Ceasefire Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 一·二八事变后中日签订的停战协定，划定上海为非武装区，限制了中国军队的活动。
description.en: A ceasefire agreement signed by China and Japan after the January 28 Incident, which designated Shanghai as a demilitarized zone and restricted Chinese military activities.

description.zh-cn: 标志着中国抗日战争全面爆发的事件，其后上海的事态日益紧张。
description.en: The event that marked the full-scale outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, after which tensions in Shanghai escalated.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事将领，时任京沪警备司令，在虹桥机场事件中下令格杀闯入机场的日军。
description.en: A Chinese military general, then commander of the Jinghu Garrison, who ordered the killing of Japanese soldiers who broke into the airport during the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 负责上海地区防务的中华民国军事机构。
description.en: The military organization of the Republic of China responsible for the defense of the Shanghai area.

description.zh-cn: 中国军官，时任虹桥机场保安团团长，执行了击毙日军的命令。
description.en: A Chinese military officer, then commander of the Hongqiao Airport Security Regiment, who carried out the order to kill the Japanese soldiers.

description.zh-cn: 中国军官，时任保安团总团长，在虹桥机场事件中向张治中报告情况。
description.en: A Chinese military officer, then commander-in-chief of the Security Regiment, who reported the situation to Zhang Zhizhong during the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任上海市长，在虹桥机场事件后参与了外交交涉。
description.en: A Chinese politician, then mayor of Shanghai, who participated in diplomatic negotiations after the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期上海市的行政管理机构。
description.en: The administrative body of Shanghai Municipality during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 日本在上海的外交代表机构，参与了虹桥机场事件的交涉。
description.en: The diplomatic representative body of Japan in Shanghai, involved in the negotiations of the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在虹桥机场事件及淞沪会战中与中国发生冲突的国家。
description.en: The country that clashed with China in the Hongqiao Airport Incident and the Battle of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 在虹桥机场事件及淞沪会战中与日本发生冲突的国家。
description.en: The country that clashed with Japan in the Hongqiao Airport Incident and the Battle of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军的师级单位，在虹桥机场事件后被调往上海。
description.en: A division-level unit of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, transferred to Shanghai after the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军的师级单位，在虹桥机场事件后被调往上海。
description.en: A division-level unit of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, transferred to Shanghai after the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 虹桥机场事件被视为淞沪会战的导火线之一，直接导致了战事的爆发。
description.en: The Hongqiao Airport Incident is considered one of the catalysts for the Battle of Shanghai, directly leading to the outbreak of the war.

description.zh-cn: 卢沟桥事变后，上海附近的事态日益紧张，中国军队加强了淞沪地区的武装力量，为虹桥机场事件的爆发创造了条件。
description.en: After the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, the situation in Shanghai became increasingly tense, and the Chinese army strengthened its forces in the Shanghai-Wusong area, creating the conditions for the outbreak of the Hongqiao Airport Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1932年的一·二八事变后，中日双方签订了《淞沪停战协定》。
description.en: After the January 28 Incident in 1932, China and Japan signed the Shanghai Ceasefire Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 时任京沪警备司令的张治中下令格杀强行闯入虹桥机场的大山勇夫。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong, then commander of the Jinghu Garrison, ordered the killing of Isao Oyama, who forcibly broke into Hongqiao Airport.

description.zh-cn: 时任京沪警备司令的张治中下令格杀强行闯入虹桥机场的斋藤要藏。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong, then commander of the Jinghu Garrison, ordered the killing of Yozo Saito, who forcibly broke into Hongqiao Airport.

description.zh-cn: 大山勇夫是日本上海海军特别陆战队的中尉。
description.en: Isao Oyama was a lieutenant in the Japanese Shanghai Special Naval Landing Party.

description.zh-cn: 斋藤要藏是日本上海海军特别陆战队的一等水兵。
description.en: Yozo Saito was a first-class seaman in the Japanese Shanghai Special Naval Landing Party.

description.zh-cn: 张治中时任京沪警备司令。
description.en: Zhang Zhizhong was the commander of the Jinghu Garrison at the time.

description.zh-cn: 机场保安团团长符岸坛在事件发生时向总团长吉章简报告。
description.en: Fu An'tan, commander of the airport security regiment, reported to Commander-in-Chief Ji Zhangjian when the incident occurred.

description.zh-cn: 总团长吉章简在接到下级报告后，再向京沪警备司令张治中报告。
description.en: After receiving a report from his subordinate, Commander-in-Chief Ji Zhangjian then reported to Zhang Zhizhong, commander of the Jinghu Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 俞鸿钧时任上海市长。
description.en: Yu Hung-chun was the mayor of Shanghai at the time.

description.zh-cn: 事件发生第二天，为息事宁人，中国军方将符岸坛撤职。
description.en: On the day after the incident, to appease the situation, the Chinese military dismissed Fu An'tan from his post.

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后当晚，上海市长俞鸿钧与日本驻沪总领事交涉，主张通过外交途径解决以避免事态扩大。
description.en: On the evening after the incident, Shanghai Mayor Yu Hung-chun negotiated with the Japanese Consul-General in Shanghai, advocating for a diplomatic solution to prevent escalation.

description.zh-cn: 双方就虹桥机场事件进行谈判，但因立场强硬，谈判未取得进展。
description.en: The two sides held negotiations on the Hongqiao Airport Incident, but no progress was made due to their firm stances.

description.zh-cn: 针对日本在虹桥机场事件后向上海增兵的行为，中方统帅部下令第八十七师等部队推进至上海进行应对。
description.en: In response to Japan's reinforcement of troops in Shanghai after the Hongqiao Airport Incident, the Chinese high command ordered the 87th Division and other units to advance to Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 针对日本在虹桥机场事件后向上海增兵的行为，中方统帅部下令第八十八师等部队推进至上海进行应对。
description.en: In response to Japan's reinforcement of troops in Shanghai after the Hongqiao Airport Incident, the Chinese high command ordered the 88th Division and other units to advance to Shanghai.
